name: Unnerving Boneyard
description: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 3580 Frost Damage over 10 seconds and applying Major Breach to enemies within, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  An ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 3375 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
effectLines: Applies Major Breach to enemies in the area, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance.
coefDescription: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing $1 Frost Damage over 10 seconds and applying Major Breach to enemies within, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  An ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing $2 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
